thread.title: U.S. sanctions Russians for election meddling, cyber attacks

title: U.S. sanctions Russians for election meddling, cyber attacks
text:
U.S. sanctions Russians for election meddling, cyber attacks 5:53pm GMT - 02:36 
The United States announced sanctions on Thursday against 19 Russian individuals and five groups over malicious cyber activity including meddling in the 2016 U.S. election. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The United States announced sanctions on Thursday against 19 Russian individuals and five groups over malicious cyber activity including meddling in the 2016 U.S. election.
